definitions.body: end, usu. of time, esp. in phr. [[מִקֵּץ]] at the end of  a definite time Ge 8:6 (J), Ge 41:1 (E), Ge 16:3 (P) + 15 t., + [[מִקֵּץ הֱיוֹת]] Es 2:12; indef. Ge 4:3 (J) 1Ki 17:7, Je 13:6; so (late) [[לְקֵץ]] of indef. time 2Ch 18:2, Ne 13:6, Da 11:6, Da 11:13; defin. [[כְעֵת חֵאת]] [[לְיׇמִים שְׁנַיִם]] ´[[הַקּ]]: 2Ch 21:19; end of life, of a people Am 8:2, Ez Eze 7:2, Eze 7:2, Eze 7:3, Eze 7:6, Eze 7:6, Je 51:13, La 4:18, La 4:18, cf. (of all flesh) Ge 6:13 (P); of individ. Job 6:11, Ps 39:5 (‖[[מִדַּת יׇמִי ]]), Da 9:26 a, Da 11:45; in eschatol. sense, [[עֵת עֲוֹן קֵץ]] time of final punishment (Toy) Ez Eze 21:30, Eze 21:34, Eze 35:5; [[לַקֵּץ]] Hb Hab 2:3 to the end; esp. Dn, of time of Antiochus’ persecution, foll. by A.’s death, [[עֵת קֵץ]] time of the end Da 8:17, Da 11:35, Da 11:40, Da 12:4, Da 12:9, ´[[מוֹעֵד ק]]: Da 8:19; cf. [[הַיׇּמִין]] ´[[ק]]: Da 12:13, ´[[ק]]: alone Da 9:26 b, Da 12:13; end, cessation, abs. [[לַמּוֹעֵד]] ´[[ק]]: Da 11:27; [[הַפְּלָאוֹת]] ´[[ק]]: Da 12:6, of words Job 16:3, darkness Job 28:3, perfection Ps 119:96; ´[[אֵין ק]]: no end, of peace Is 9:6, iniquities Job 22:5, toil Ec 4:8, [[עֲשׂוֹת סְפָרִים]] Ec 12:12.
end, in space, [[מְלוֹן קִצּה]] 2Ki 19:23 its remotest lodging-place = Is 37:24 (v. [[מָלוֹן]] p.533); ´[[אֵין ק]]:, of multitude Ec 4:16.—Je 50:26 v. [[קָחֶה]]
